mapper.sql: id, ip, total, intercept, last_access_time, created_time
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_access_count
id,
ip,
total,
intercept,
last_access_time,
created_time,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{total,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{intercept,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{lastAccessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update sys_access_count
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER},
intercept = #{intercept,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_access_time = #{lastAccessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_access_count set ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intercept = #{intercept,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_access_time = #{lastAccessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from sys_access_count where ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and created_time >= CONCAT(left(now(),10),' 00:00:00') and created_time <CONCAT(left(now(),10),' 23:59:59')
mapper.insert: insert into sys_access_count (id, ip, total, intercept, last_access_time, created_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total}, #{intercept,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update sys_access_count set total = #{total},intercept = #{intercept},last_access_time = now() where id = #{id}
